description: A welcoming restaurant with a rustic feel. The owner - chef delights guests with his traditional yet imaginative delicacies, such as pici pasta with Pachino cherry tomatoes, garlic and chilli peppers and the renowned Chianina steak. Fish occasionally features on the menu.
